appendInterestRateRecord(SettlementToken.details: Throws an error if the settlement token is not registered.

params.annualRateBPS: The annual interest rate in basis points.
params.beginTimestamp: The timestamp when the interest rate begins.
params.token: The address of the settlement token.

calculateInterest(SettlementTokenRegistr.details: Throws an error if the token is not registered.

params.amount: The amount of settlement tokens to calculate interest for.
params.from: The starting timestamp of the interest calculation (inclusive).
params.to: The ending timestamp of the interest calculation (exclusive).
params.token: The address of the settlement token.

currentInterestRate(SettlementTokenRegis.details: Throws an error if the settlement token is not registered.

params.token: The address of the settlement token.

returns.annualRateBPS: The current annual interest rate in basis points.

params.token: The address of the settlement token.

returns._0: uint256 The earning distribution threshold for the token.

params.token: The address of the settlement token.

returns._0: uint256 The flash loan fee rate for the settlement token.

params.token: The address of the settlement token.

returns._0: The array of interest rate records.

params.token: The address of the asettlement token.

returns._0: uint256 The minimum margin for the asettlement token.

params.token: The address of the settlement token.

returns._0: uint24 The Uniswap fee tier for the settlement token.

params.token: The address of the token to check.

returns._0: bool Whether the token is registered.

register(SettlementTokenRegistry storage.details: Throws an error if the token is already registered.

params.earningDistributionThreshold: The earning distribution threshold for the token.
params.flashLoanFeeRate: The flash loan fee rate for the token.
params.interestRate: The initial interest rate for the token.
params.minimumMargin: The minimum margin for the token.
params.token: The address of the token to register.
params.uniswapFeeTier: The Uniswap fee tier for the token.

removeLastInterestRateRecord(SettlementT.details: The current time must be less than the begin timestamp of the last record.      Otherwise throws an error with the message `INTEREST_RATE_ALREADY_APPLIED`.Throws an error if the settlement token is not registered.

params.token: The address of the settlement token.

params.earningDistributionThreshold: The new earning distribution threshold for the settlement token.
params.token: The address of the settlement token.

params.flashLoanFeeRate: The new flash loan fee rate for the settlement token.
params.token: The address of the settlement token.

params.minimumMargin: The new minimum margin for the settlement token.
params.token: The address of the settlement token.
The address of the settlement token.
params.uniswapFeeTier: The new Uniswap fee tier for the settlement token.

returns._0: An array of addresses representing the registered settlement tokens.

appendInterestRateRecord(SettlementToken.notice: Appends an interest rate record for a settlement token.

calculateInterest(SettlementTokenRegistr.notice: Calculates the interest accrued for a settlement token within a specified time range.

currentInterestRate(SettlementTokenRegis.notice: Retrieves the current interest rate for a settlement token.

getEarningDistributionThreshold(Settleme.notice: Retrieves the earning distribution threshold for a settlement token.

getFlashLoanFeeRate(SettlementTokenRegis.notice: Retrieves the flash loan fee rate for a settlement token.

getInterestRateRecords(SettlementTokenRe.notice: Retrieves the array of interest rate records for a settlement token.

getMinimumMargin(SettlementTokenRegistry.notice: Retrieves the minimum margin for a asettlement token.

getUniswapFeeTier(SettlementTokenRegistr.notice: Retrieves the Uniswap fee tier for a settlement token.

isRegistered(SettlementTokenRegistry sto.notice: Checks if a token is registered in the settlement token registry.

register(SettlementTokenRegistry storage.notice: Registers a token in the settlement token registry.

removeLastInterestRateRecord(SettlementT.notice: Removes the last interest rate record for a settlement token.

setEarningDistributionThreshold(Settleme.notice: Sets the earning distribution threshold for a settlement token.

setFlashLoanFeeRate(SettlementTokenRegis.notice: Sets the flash loan fee rate for a settlement token.

setMinimumMargin(SettlementTokenRegistry.notice: Sets the minimum margin for asettlement token.

setUniswapFeeTier(SettlementTokenRegistr.notice: Sets the Uniswap fee tier for a settlement token.

settlementTokens(SettlementTokenRegistry.notice: Returns an array of all registered settlement tokens.

userdoc.notice: Library for managing the settlement token registry.
